uart-serial-txbuf-size.help: Default TX buffer size for a UARTSerial instance (unit Bytes))

uart-serial-rxbuf-size.help: Default RX buffer size for a UARTSerial instance (unit Bytes))

spi_count_max.help: The maximum number of SPI peripherals used at the same time. Determines RAM allocated for SPI peripheral management. If null, limit determined by hardware.
